page.title: 01General
page.content: Most of the buildings in Shepton Beauchamp and the surrounding villages are built from the warm coloured local stone. Many of the houses are very old and have been modernised. In the past the farms in this area have been mixed but these days most of the fertile land is used for fruit and vegetable growing especially as the sandy soil drains quickly helping at harvest time. There are still some local families living in the area but many people have moved here in the last ten or twenty years.
